amendment.description: To make available with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Army, for the Telemedicine and Advanced Technology Research Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1394 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1394 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652) To make available with an offset, an additional $1,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Army, for the Telemedicine and Advanced Technology Research Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1394 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1394 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Sessions.
